turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hey there.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how can i help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Looking to order some coffee for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, where from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Peet's Coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which peet's did you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the one, Catalina Boulevard in San Diego.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. what did you want from there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted one iced vanilla latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what milk type did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get some whipped cream on top of it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so the order is for 1 large iced vanilla latte with 2 % milk and whipped cream from peet's coffee on catalina blvd. in san diego.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $4.50 is the total. should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, go ahead and order it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed the order. it'll be ready in 10 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope. Just wanted the coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. enjoy the coffee in 9 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: bye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Will do, yeah.
